price: İman gətirib saleh əməllər edənlərə gəlincə isə, onlar Cənnət bağçalarında sevinc içində olacaqlar.
arabic: فَأَمَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ فَهُمۡ فِي رَوۡضَةٖ يُحۡبَرُونَ

version.title: Azerbaijani translation - Ali Khan Mosaiv
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Azerbaijani by Khan Mosaiv. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: fa-ammā alladhīna āmanū waʿamilū al-ṣāliḥāti fahum fī rawḍatin yuḥ'barūna
